get.description: Retrieve a list of python 2 packages.

parameters.description: Name of an Azure Resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: The name of the automation account.
parameters.name: automationAccountName

parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.description: Client Api Version.
parameters.name: api-version

schema.description: The response model for the list module operation.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the next link.

value.description: Gets or sets a list of modules.

allOf.description: The core properties of ARM resources

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource

name.description: The name of the resource

location.description: The Azure Region where the resource lives

etag.description: Gets or sets the etag of the resource.

properties.description: Gets or sets the module properties.

activityCount.description: Gets or sets the activity count of the module.

contentLink.description: Gets or sets the contentLink of the module.

algorithm.description: Gets or sets the content hash algorithm used to hash the content.

value.description: Gets or sets expected hash value of the content.

uri.description: Gets or sets the uri of the runbook content.

version.description: Gets or sets the version of the content.

creationTime.description: Gets or sets the creation time.

error.description: Gets or sets the error info of the module.

code.description: Gets or sets the error code.

message.description: Gets or sets the error message.

isComposite.description: Gets or sets type of module, if its composite or not.

isGlobal.description: Gets or sets the isGlobal flag of the module.

lastModifiedTime.description: Gets or sets the last modified time.

provisioningState.description: Gets or sets the provisioning state of the module.

sizeInBytes.description: Gets or sets the size in bytes of the module.

version.description: Gets or sets the version of the module.

default.description: Automation error response describing why the operation failed.

schema.description: Error response of an operation failure

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

valueFromPipeline.description: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates true if the parameter can take values from the incoming pipeline objects. This setting is used if the cmdlet must access the complete input object. false indicates that the parameter cannot take values from the complete input object.

valueFromPipelineByPropertyName.description: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates true if the parameter can be filled from a property of the incoming pipeline object that has the same name as this parameter. false indicates that the parameter cannot be filled from the incoming pipeline object property with the same name.

valueFromRemainingArguments.description: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates true if the cmdlet parameter accepts all the remaining command-line arguments that are associated with this parameter in the form of an array. false if the cmdlet parameter does not accept all the remaining argument values.
